001package net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Holder;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.StaticFactory;
005
006import java.util.function.Function;
007import java.util.function.Supplier;
008
009/**
010 * A simple generic holder class that encapsulates a value of type {@code K}.
011 * <p>
012 * This class is useful as a mutable reference wrapper, for example:
013 * <ul>
014 *   <li>Passing a value into lambdas or callbacks where reassignment is needed.</li>
015 *   <li>Adjusting a stored value atomically using a function.</li>
016 *   <li>Temporarily holding objects that may be cleared and reset later.</li>
017 * </ul>
018 *
019 * @param <K> the type of the value being held
020 */
021@Holder
022public class SimpleHolder<K> implements Supplier<K> {
023
024    private K value;
025
026    /**
027     * Creates a new holder initialized to {@code null}.
028     */
029    @StaticFactory
030    public static <K> SimpleHolder<K> create() {
031        return new SimpleHolder<>(null);
032    }
033
034    /**
035     * Creates a new holder with the given initial value.
036     *
037     * @param value the initial value to store, may be {@code null}
038     */
039    public SimpleHolder(K value) {
040        this.value = value;
041    }
042
043    /**
044     * Retrieves the current value stored in this holder.
045     *
046     * @return the current value, may be {@code null}
047     */
048    @Override
049    public K get() {
050        return value;
051    }
052
053    /**
054     * Replaces the current value with the given one.
055     *
056     * @param value the new value to store, may be {@code null}
057     */
058    public void set(K value) {
059        this.value = value;
060    }
061
062    /**
063     * Adjusts the current value by applying the given function.
064     * <p>
065     * This method is synchronized to ensure that the adjustment
066     * is applied atomically in multi-threaded environments.
067     *
068     * @param adjustment a function that takes the current value and returns the adjusted value
069     * @throws NullPointerException if the adjustment function is {@code null}
070     */
071    public synchronized void adjust(Function<K, K> adjustment) {
072        value = adjustment.apply(value);
073    }
074
075
076    /**
077     * Clears the holder by setting its value to {@code null}.
078     */
079    public void clear() {
080        value = null;
081    }
082}
